Preparation and adoption of a new action plan is needed.

bird_report.measures_taken: Monitoring of waterfowl hunting bags is carried out. Hunting regulations in development to improve the statistics on hunting bags. Hunting of the species is not allowed in the spring and during the breeding season.
bird_report.further_information: Monitoring of hunting bags carried out by Laboratory of Ornithology of Institute of Biology of University of Latvia: http://www.lubi.edu.lv/index2.php?lang=1&sid=36 Offical statistics collected by State Forest Service: http://www.vmd.gov.lv

pressure_threat.sources: Mednis A., Viksne J., Stipniece A. 2003. Population of Garganey and Shoveler in Latvia. In: Svazas S., Viksne J., Kuresoo A., Kozulin A. (eds.) The Garganey and Shoveler in the Baltic States and Belarus. Vilnius: OMPO Vilnius, 51–70 pp.
